overview:
Bob Rosenschein is founder and was chairman and CEO of Answers.com.

Prior to founding Answers, he founded and was CEO of Accent Software, a company that developed multi-lingual software tools. He previously served as a software developer for Data General, American Management Systems, the World Bank and Ashton Tate.

Bob graduated with a B.Sc. in Computer Science from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology in 1976, received the Prime Minister of Israel’s Award for Software Achievement in 1997, and was named an Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year 2009 Award Finalist in the Metropolitan New York region.
